original_text: The people from Avva made idols of their gods called Nibhaz and Tartak. The people from Sepharvaim burned their children in fire as offerings to their gods, Adrammelech and Anammelech.
korean_text: 아와 사람들은 닙하스와 다르닥을 만들었고 스발와임 사람들은 그 자녀를 불살라 그들의 신 아드람멜렉과 아남멜렉에게 드렸으며

sentences.original_text: The people from Avva made idols
of their gods called Nibhaz and Tartak
sentences.korean_translation: 니바스와 닥다르이라 불리는 그들의 신들을 위해

sentences.original_text: The people from Sepharvaim burned their children in fire
sentences.korean_translation: 스발바임 사람들은 자기 자녀들을 불에 태웠습니다
